ConnectionStrings.TrainerTracks: Add the DB connection in your secrets.json file. See https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/aspnet/core/security/app-secrets?view=aspnetcore-2.1&tabs=windows

TrainerTracksConfig.JwtKey: replace me in secrets.json file using a new GUID
TrainerTracksConfig.BaseTrainerFormsDirectory: replace me in the secrets.json file
TrainerTracksConfig.BaseClientFormsDirectory: replace me in the secrets.json file
